Blog.post: Ok, once a week I'm gonna do a shout out to a friend of mine. First person is...Dez! Dez, You are an awesome person. I have learned so much stuff from you. You are a great friend, and it has rocked getting to know you better this summer, and becoming a better friend with you. You are my best friend who is a girl. You rock. From "Red Dot" to "CrzGrl" we've been through alot. I'm so happy that you are going to West Ranch with me, even though it sucks that you won't be going to school with Wes anymore. I can't wait to be in ASB and Video with you next year, and maybe even another class or two. Its fun to watch Family Guy, Whose Line, and Futurama with you (Spot the Star Trek Costumes!). And, well, you just an all around cool, awesome person. :) -Sean
I hate how sometimes you think you have a really close friend, and then they go and do something really mean to you :( -Sean

On a dare from Dez: A GIRLY-GIRL. You dont have a lot of self-esteem and people are always bringing you down for being sad. What do they know, anyway? You feel like youre too mature for your age and are frustrated by the trend-followers who refuse to accept you because youre not like them. Your virtues: Intelligence, understanding nature, modesty. Your flaws: Lack of social life, inferiority complex, timidity.. You might like this game, but maybe it's not your thing. Take a look anyway if you are curious: www.life-blood.vze.com urlLink What kind of girl are you? brought to you by urlLink Quizilla -Sean
What the hell is this site? urlLink Rainbow Primates Thats just scary. USDA Approved? -Sean

Saw Spiderman. It was OK. Liked most of it, but the ending sucked. What kind of bride does that to her husband? I mean, I've heard of ditching, but that was a little much. Anywho, my NexFlix movie should come tomorrow. Its been too long. I want it! -Sean

Well, I'm off to go see Spiderman 2 with Tyler. Looks interesting, espically how the critics are split 50/50, with half of them loving it, and half of them hating it. I'll review when I get back. Also, look for some new features to pop up in the next few days. Sean -Sean

Ok, its 2 AM, and nothing is on TV except for reruns of Family Guy that I saw 3 hours ago. Ahh....life is boring. Well, at least its a good Family Guy. Its the Y2K one. Woohoo. Anyway, I think I need some water. Later. -Sean
Yup. Here it is. My First post of my 6th blog. Yay. -Sean
Ugh...I can't believe we have flames again. At least they are on the other side of the valley now. Pictures later. -Sean

Ode To Spot Felis Cattus, is your taxonomic nomenclature, an endothermic quadruped carnivorous by nature? Your visual, olfactory and auditory senses contribute to your hunting skills, and natural defenses. I find myself intrigued by your subvocal oscillations, a singular development of cat communications that obviates your basic hedonistic predilection for a rhythmic stroking of your fur, to demonstrate affection. A tail is quite essential for your acrobatic talents; you would not be so agile if you lacked its counterbalance. And when not being utilized to aide in locomotion, it often serves to illustrate the state of your emotion. O Spot, the complex levels of behaviour you display connote a fairly well-developed cognitive array. And though you are not sentient, Spot, and do not comprehend, I nonetheless consider you a true and valued friend. -Data Sorry, just had to post that! -Sean
urlLink CNN.com - Grieving family finds wrong body in casket - Jul 14, 2004 Tell me...how in the age of DNA Sequencing and medical technology do we mistake the body of one person for another? -Sean

I got a nifty window fan for my room. I could feel the coolness wafting in the moment I turned it on. Could this be the end to my restless, sweaty nights? Tune in tomorrow for the conclusion! -Sean

I now offer a seans blog toolbar that you can download. Of the many features it has, the most notable are: -Alexa.com Search (one of the best engines on the net!) -Pop-up blocker (very useful) -Info on every site you visit (Such as rank on the internet, etc) -Shows you sites related to the one you are visiting -And More! Plus, if you ever buy a product off amazon.com with this toolbar installed, Amazon will donate a part of the price to one of my favorite sites on the internet, FabulousDisneyBabe.com. So, come on, download it today! Its FREE! -Sean

Long time, no see! Lets see, I went to the Dodger game, saw double homers and a grand slam, don't see that often.. I also started working at Kid Flix Camp, seems the newbies arn't that bad, better than what I've had to work with before. One more week, then I'm done with that. Ryan made me an awesome cape and mask, and made Brittany her God crown...that was pretty funny, though Kass didn't really like it, considering he was paying us for messing around ;-) Oh, Steven dosn't know basic Star Trek triva...he deserves to be pelted with tricorders for the rest of eternity. -Sean
just what I want from the bargain bin -Sean

As many of you know, I am taking AP Biology in 9th grade (college in 9th grade. I'm exuberant. :| ). We were given a huge summer assignment, about 53 pages. I'm happy to report that, with little less than two weeks left in summer, I have gotten to page 27. 50% done. Woohoo. :| -Sean

I now have a mailing list which you can join. When you join, you will get notifications of postings in email, as well as comments. I may also send out a message every once in a while telling you things about my personal life which other blog readers won't see...;) urlLink Click Me to join. With that, I can't believe how many views this stupid thing has gotten! Over 8000! WOW!!!!!! The counter is on the toolbar on the right. I seriously can't believe it. This is amazing. Who's reading this thing, anyway? -Sean

Full name: Sean Herron Nicknames: uh…none Sex: Guy Birthday: Jan 7, 1990 Name three bad habits that you have: 1) Procrastination 2) I dunno 3) I dunno Name four television shows you love: 1) Star Trek 2) Futurama 3) Family Guy Name four drinks you regularly drink: 1) Coke 2) Water 3) Pepsi 4) Milk Have you ever... 1. Fallen for your Best Friend? nope 2. Made out with JUST a friend? Nope 3. Been rejected? Yep..loads of times 4. Been in love? yah 5. Been arrested? nope 6. Used someone? nope 7. Ever been used? yah 8. Cheated on someone? Nobody to cheat on 9. Been cheated on? nope 10. Done something you regret? yah Who was the last person.... 1. You touched? Uhh..my sister…when I was dragging her out of my room… 2. You talked to? Desiree 3. You hugged? Uhh…..Tiana 4. You instant messaged? Desiree 5. You kissed? mom 6. You yelled at? Sister 7. You laughed with? Desiree 8. You had a crush on? Uhh…..Bethany 9. Who broke your heart? Bethany DO YOU: 1. Colour your hair? nope 2. Have tattoos? nope 3. have Piercing(s)? nope 4. Have a girlfriend? nope 5. Floss daily? My dentist thinks so 6. Like to groove to the music? no 7. Think you are cultured? depends 8. Like to drive fast? No, but I like to fly fast. 9. Believe in God or Devil? I’ll tell you when I die 10. Believe in The Closet Monster? Yes, I’m having tea with him right now 11. What should you be doing right now? AP Bio HW 12. What are you listening to? nothin 13. Can you do anything freakish with your body? Wiggle my ears… 14. Chicken or fish? Chicken…fish is ewie and gooey 15. Favorite Season? Winter 16. Is ice cream the best thing in the world? no 17. What would your dream date be? As of now, bethany 18. Single flower or a dozen? Uhh..one I guess 19. Silver, gold or platinum? gold 20. Candle lit dinner in a restaurant or at home? Home is where the heart is 21. Roses or wild flowers? roses 22. Silly or serious romantic? silly 23. Marvin Gaye or Barry White? Who? 24. Do you consider yourself a romantic? Hahahaa…yeah right 25. Watch a sunrise/sunset? sunset 26. What'is in your CD player right now? Notin….I don’t own CD’s…..AAC all the way!!! (its like mp3, only sounds better) 28. Favorite Disney Characters? Mickey! 29. Favorite fast food? Panda Express 30. Favorite book? Hmm…Harry Potter 31. Favorite Sports teams? None really..but I guess the Dodgers are OK… 32. Favorite song? Aquarius 33. What room is your computer in? Which one? My main comp is everywhere (laptop) 34. What is your shoe size? 11.5 to 12, depending on the shoe 35. Happy or scary movies? Happy! 36. What will you be when you grow up? NASA Scientist 37. Who are your best friends? Tyler, Lauren, Desiree, uhh…that’s bout it 38. Who will respond the quickest? Dez 39. What can you say about the person who sent this to you? No one sent it to me…I got it from Rita’s blog…..uhh..Rita, I havn’t seen you in like 3 years, but uhh…..I hope to see you soon..or something… -Sean
Due to the fact that so many people have been portraying others in comments, I have made it so that you must register before you post. Registering is free and takes less than 5 min. -Sean

Ok, so in the recent days, I feel life has just been a bore. As of now, this is what I do every day. 9 to 10 ish: Wake up 10-12 ish: Do Bio HW 12-12:30 ish: Lunch 12:30 - 1: Read a book 1-7ish: Bio HW 7-7:30: Dinner 7:30-11: Bio HW 11 to 2:30ish: Talk to Dez and Watch Adult Swim Yup. Thats my life. It really is boring. I need to DO something. I need a LIFE. I seriously can't wait til school starts. -Sean
